item.title: [Python] How to use Realsense Python wrapper PyRealsense with Jetson Nano
item.description: ![realsense_align_depth.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/81919/4f8ef3fa-023a-2a1d-01d1-3ae355dbec6d.png) What is #PyRealsense (pyrealsense2) A wrapper program for handling Intel’s Depth camera Realsense in Python. With Python, you can easily get Realsense images and depth information. It is very convenient when you want to acquire depth information after image recognition by deep learning using Python with Realsense. If you have an X86 PC, you can easily install it with pip install pyrealsense, but with the Jetson Nano from Arm, you need to devise it, so I will briefly explain how to set it up and how to use it.
